trans-unit.source: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示支援水平捲軸中的索引標籤標頭面板<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The RibbonTabHeadersPanel provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.
trans-unit.target: RibbonTabHeadersPanel 提供線條<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader><xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>中</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader>控制項的水平捲軸

trans-unit.source: Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援向上或向下捲動並逐頁捲動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Positions and sizes the child elements in this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 放置並調整大小，在這個子項目<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The size that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref> needs to position its child elements.
trans-unit.target: 大小的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>需要將其子項目。

trans-unit.source: The actual size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 實際大小<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以水平軸上捲動。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: This API is not implemented.
trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.target: 不支援向上或向下捲動並逐頁捲動。

trans-unit.source: 0.0 in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下&0;.0。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrolled content in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得捲動內容的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>值。 面板的內部<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>

trans-unit.target: 中的捲動內容的水平大小[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。

trans-unit.target: 取得捲動內容的水平位移[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.target: 不支援向上或向下捲動並逐頁捲動。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content left by one line.
trans-unit.target: 捲動一行所留下的內容。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content right by one line.
trans-unit.target: 將內容捲動的一行。

trans-unit.target: 這個 API 未實作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>.

trans-unit.source: Forces content to scroll until the coordinate space of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object is visible.
trans-unit.target: 強制內容捲動直到的座標空間<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>物件為可見。

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示物件。

trans-unit.source: A bounding rectangle that identifies the coordinate space to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 識別要顯示之座標空間的周框。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 會顯示矩形。

trans-unit.target: 這個屬性就沒有預設值。
